scripts.release: standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.release:first: standard-version --first-release && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
